AT.name: Mega Man™ X2
AT.description: In dem Actionklassiker Mega Man X2 muss X es mit einer neuen Bedrohung aufnehmen: Reploid-Kampfroboter-Rebellen namens X-Jäger und acht neue, noch gefährlichere Kampfroboter! Glücklicherweise hat Dr. Light X mit modernsten Aufrüstungen ausgestattet. Spüre die Kapseln auf, um X mit einem Doppel-Aufladeschuss, einer Panzerrüstung und anderen Power-Ups auszurüsten. Außerdem kann X sich hinter das Steuer von Maschinen wie der mobilen Angriffsrüstung und dem mobilen Angriffsgleiter setzen. Und natürlich kann er die Spezialwaffen besiegter Kampfroboter verwenden, um die Gegner mit ihren eigenen Waffen zu schlagen! Hierbei handelt es sich um die US-Version des Spiels.

BE.name: Mega Man™ X2
BE.description: Dans Mega Man X2, un grand classique du jeu d'action, X doit combattre une nouvelle menace : des Reploïdes rebelles plus connus sous le nom de chasseurs de X, ainsi que huit nouveaux chefs rebelles encore plus redoutables ! Heureusement, le Dr. Light est là pour vous aider avec ses inventions ! X peut s'équiper d'un tir double charge, d'une armure et d'autres améliorations. Il peut également prendre les commandes de l'armure d'attaque mobile et de la moto d'attaque mobile. Bien entendu, X peut utiliser les armes des rebelles qu'il a vaincus pour les employer contre les autres ! Ceci est la version américaine du jeu.

BR.name: Mega Man X2
BR.description: Logo após derrotar Sigma e os seus Mavericks, Mega Man X vai até uma fábrica abandonada a procura do restante dos trapaceiros Reploids, onde eles continuam a sua rebelião. Enquanto Mega Man X se mantém ocupado lutando contra 8 novos Mavericks, uma nova ameaça conspira trazer de volta uma arma secreta que é muito familiar! Guie o Mega Man X através de 8 estágios em sua busca para destruir o restante dos Mavericks, obtenha os poderes deles e desvende a entidade que os guia. Pilote veículos poderosos como a moto de combate, e com a ajuda do bondoso Dr. Light, descubra novas habilidades incríveis escondidas em capsulas que estão enterradas pelo mundo. Somente então X estará pronto para encarar o seu destino como caçador de Mavericks!

AU.name: Mega Man™ X2
AU.description: In the action classic Mega Man X2, X must lead a fight against a new threat: Maverick Reploid rebels known as X-Hunters, plus eight new and deadlier Mavericks! Fortunately, Dr Light has supplied state of the art upgrades. Seek out the capsules to equip X with a Double Charge Shot, Body Armour and more. X can also ride in vehicles like the Mobile Attack Armour and Mobile Attack Cycle. And of course, X can use the abilities of defeated Mavericks, to turn the enemies' weapons against them! This is the US version of the game.

CA.name: Mega Man X2
CA.description: Fresh from defeating Sigma and his Mavericks, Mega Man X tracks down the remaining rogue Reploids to an abandoned factory where they are continuing their rebellion. While Mega Man X is kept busy by eight all-new Mavericks, a new threat plots to resurrect a secret weapon that is all too familiar! Now, guide Mega Man X through eight stages in his search to destroy the remaining Mavericks, gain their powers, and uncover the secret entity guiding them all. Also, pilot powerful new vehicles like the mobile attack cycle, and with help from the good Dr. Light, discover incredible new abilities hidden in capsules buried throughout the world. Only then will X will be ready to face his destiny as a Maverick Hunter!

ES.name: Mega Man™ X2
ES.description: En el clásico juego de acción Mega Man X2, X deberá liderar la batalla contra una nueva amenaza: los reploides rebeldes conocidos como X-Hunters, además de ocho nuevos y mortales jefes. Por suerte, X contará con los inventos del Dr. Light, como la doble carga para el Cañón X, la armadura corporal y otras mejoras que se encuentran en las cápsulas. Dispondrá incluso de varios vehículos, como la motocicleta y la armadura de combate. Y, por supuesto, X podrá utilizar las habilidades de los jefes que derrote y hacer que el enemigo pruebe su propia medicina. Esta es la versión estadounidense del juego.

FR.description: Dans Mega Man X2, un grand classique du jeu d'action, X doit combattre une nouvelle menace : des Reploïdes rebelles plus connus sous le nom de chasseurs de X, ainsi que huit nouveaux chefs rebelles encore plus redoutables ! LV.description: In the action classic Mega Man X2, X must lead a fight against a new threat: Maverick Reploid rebels known as X-Hunters, plus eight new and deadlier Mavericks! Fortunately, Dr Light has supplied state of the art upgrades. Seek out the capsules to equip X with a Double Charge Shot, Body Armour and more. X can also ride in vehicles like the Mobile Attack Armour and Mobile Attack Cycle. And of course, X can use the abilities of defeated Mavericks, to turn the enemies' weapons against them! This is the US version of the game.

IT.name: Mega Man™ X2
IT.description: In Mega Man X2, un vero classico dei giochi d'azione, devi affrontare nuove minacce: i Reploid ribelli, noti anche come "cacciatori di X", e otto nuovi e pericolosi Maverick! Fortunatamente, il Dr. Light ha messo a disposizione dei potenziamenti sofisticatissimi. Trova le capsule per acquisire tante incredibili risorse, come il doppio super colpo o l'armatura. Avrai anche la possibilità di sfruttare fantastici mezzi, come l'esoscheletro e la moto da combattimento. Naturalmente, avrai come sempre l'occasione di acquisire le abilità dei Maverick sconfitti per combattere il nemico con le sue stesse armi! Questa è la versione americana del gioco.

MX.name: Mega Man X2
MX.description: Tras derrotar a Sigma y a sus rebeldes, Mega Man X sigue el rastro de los malvados Reploids hasta una fábrica abandonada en la que continúan planeando su rebelión. Mientras Mega Man X se enfrenta a ocho rebeldes totalmente nuevos, una nueva trama amenaza con resucitar un arma secreta muy conocida. Guía a Mega Man X a través de ocho niveles en su intento por destruir al resto de rebeldes, obtener sus poderes y descubrir la entidad secreta que los controla. Ponte a los mandos de nuevos y potentes vehículos como la moto de ataque móvil y, con la ayuda del honrado Dr. Light, descubre nuevas e increíbles habilidades ocultas en cápsulas enterradas por todo el mundo. ¡Solo entonces X estará listo para enfrentarse a su destino como cazador de rebeldes!

NZ.name: Mega Man™ X2
NZ.description: In the action classic Mega Man X2, X must lead a fight against a new threat: Maverick Reploid rebels known as X-Hunters, plus eight new and deadlier Mavericks! Fortunately, Dr Light has supplied state of the art upgrades. Seek out the capsules to equip X with a Double Charge Shot, Body Armour and more. X can also ride in vehicles like the Mobile Attack Armour and Mobile Attack Cycle. And of course, X can use the abilities of defeated Mavericks, to turn the enemies' weapons against them! This is the US version of the game.

MT.name: Mega Man™ X2
MT.description: In the action classic Mega Man X2, X must lead a fight against a new threat: Maverick Reploid rebels known as X-Hunters, plus eight new and deadlier Mavericks! Fortunately, Dr Light has supplied state of the art upgrades. Seek out the capsules to equip X with a Double Charge Shot, Body Armour and more. X can also ride in vehicles like the Mobile Attack Armour and Mobile Attack Cycle. And of course, X can use the abilities of defeated Mavericks, to turn the enemies' weapons against them! This is the US version of the game.

PT.name: Mega Man™ X2
PT.description: No clássico de ação Mega Man X2, X terá que liderar a batalha contra uma nova ameaça: um bando de rebeldes Maverick Reploid, conhecidos como os X-Hunters, para além de oito novos e ainda mais letais Mavericks! Felizmente, o Dr. Light providenciou upgrades com a mais recente tecnologia. Procura as cápsulas para equipares X com um Double Charge Shot, um Body Armour e muitos mais. E, claro, X pode utilizar as habilidades de Mavericks derrotados, vencendo o inimigo com as suas próprias armas! Esta é a versão do jogo para os EUA.

RU.name: Mega Man™ X2
RU.description: В классической экшн-игре Mega Man X2 герой Икс возглавит бой против новой угрозы: восставших реплоидов, известных также как X-Hunters. Но злодеям на подмогу пришли восемь других повстанцев, наводящих еще больший ужас! К счастью, Dr Light разработал несколько технологических новинок, которые помогут вам в борьбе с врагом. Ищите капсулы, чтобы стрелять двойным зарядом, получить бронежилет или другую экипировку и возможности. В образе героя Икс вы сможете также управлять боевыми машинами Mobile Attack Armour и Mobile Attack Cycle. И конечно же, вы сможете воспользоваться умениями побежденных вами реплоидов, обращая их оружие против них самих. Эта версия игры предназначена для продажи в США.

SE.name: Mega Man™ X2
SE.description: In the action classic Mega Man X2, X must lead a fight against a new threat: Maverick Reploid rebels known as X-Hunters, plus eight new and deadlier Mavericks! Fortunately, Dr Light has supplied state of the art upgrades. Seek out the capsules to equip X with a Double Charge Shot, Body Armour and more. X can also ride in vehicles like the Mobile Attack Armour and Mobile Attack Cycle. And of course, X can use the abilities of defeated Mavericks, to turn the enemies' weapons against them! NL.name: Mega Man™ X2
NL.description: In de actie-klassieker Mega Man X2 moet X het gevecht leiden tegen een nieuwe dreiging: rebellerende reploids die bekend staan als de X-Hunters plus acht nieuwe en nog dodelijkere robots! Gelukkig levert Dr Light de broodnodige hypermoderne upgrades. Zoek naar de capsules om X uit te rusten met een dubbel geladen schot, lichaamspantser en meer. Verder kan X voertuigen besturen zoals de mobiele aanvalstank en de mobiele aanvalsmotor. Verder kan hij natuurlijk de eigenschappen van de verslagen robots gebruiken om zijn vijanden te verslaan met hun eigen wapens! Dit is de Amerikaanse versie van het spel.

PL.name: Mega Man™ X2
PL.description: In the action classic Mega Man X2, X must lead a fight against a new threat: Maverick Reploid rebels known as X-Hunters, plus eight new and deadlier Mavericks!
